source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
hd.[SalesOrderID], hd.[CustomerID], hd.[OrderDate], hd.[SubTotal],
od.[SalesOrderDetailID], od.[ProductID], od.[UnitPrice], od.[LineTotal],od.[UnitPriceDiscount]
FROM [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader] hd INNER JOIN [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] od
ON hd.[SalesOrderID] = od.[SalesOrderID]

scriptLines: details as (mobile as string, city as string)
